name: Virtual Fantasy World
description: Features:- 1.This project is containing two different worlds snow world and forest world. 2.In the snow world you can feel the stormy winds and some hills all around you with some mist and sunlight hardly passing through the mist giving a feel of cold deserted place. 3.There you will find a deserted mansion which is really huge everything inside is fresh and neat it’s a modern house you can explore the house each corner how long you want. 4.This house is middle of nowhere so you can feel its emptiness there are total of three floors entrance hall, dining hall and bedroom. 5.Inside the house at ground floor you will find a unusual door which lead you to another world which is forest as soon as you enter there. 6.In forest world you will find hills lots of trees huge grass and bushes and a shiny environment. 7.In there you can feel the surrounding of birds chippering river flowing and animals making sounds and a sharp sunlight passing through leaf of the trees. 8.You can explore this world as long as you want climbing hills walking over grass watching trees and other colorful plants. 9.As soon as you open the door you will be welcomed with a message over the screen and door will open like it was not opened for a very long time. 10. you can walk there , run , jump and also focus on the things to observe them clearly. Controls:- W – Forward A – Left S – Right D – Back Shift(Hold) – Run F – Open Door Right Mouse Click(Hold) – Aim/Focus Middle Click – Switch Side While in Aim Space – Jump
